turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a pizza at Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can i be of your assistance?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order pizza at Bella Luna sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Four pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizza would you like to order today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 pizza, ok what size will your pizza be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 medium, got it, what about your toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get two Meat Lover's pizzas and two Combo pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 with meat lovers, 2 combinations is that right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, any other special instruction?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you have extra cheese on all of them, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok all with extra cheese got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me repeat all that for you, one moment please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so we have 4 medium pizzas , 2 meat lover and 2 combinations, all with extra pizza, final order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oh sorry, i meant extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your total comes to 70 dollars with 4 medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: shall we go a had?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, you can order that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all. Thank you very much. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcome, enjoy your pizza.
